name: 寄甡  Symbiotic Love
description: 《寄甡》是一款百合向视觉小说游戏，讲述了一场现代百合版、宛如“罗密欧与朱丽叶”的凄美爱情故事。
minimum_requirements: OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10 Processor: i3 2GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT 625M Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10 Processor: i3 2GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 Ti Storage: 2 GB available space
